subject: Order #SSN2782
description_text:
Hello,

Order #SSN2782

conversations.body_text: Hi Dean0,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break and will ship your order on the 9th. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Thanks, is it possible to remove the baseplate from my order and get that
part refunded (Â£59.16) as I've realised I don't need it, thanks
Hi Dean0,    We apologize, but your package has already been shipped. We are unable to remove this portion for you. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959302743
